sentence.Network_en: Each plebe gets a canteen, which is hung off the back of their new uniforms.
sentence.Network_cn: 每个普莱贝得到一个食堂, 这是挂了他们的新制服回来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译英语词汇网 -... ... pleb 平民 plebe 军官学校新生 plebeian 平民.
就像西点军校一般，这些庶民 (Plebe) 平常要身著军装，走路要列对而行，平日不可出学校大门半步。
14日棉花现货价格 ... 坦桑尼亚 RAGA/S 喀麦隆 PLEBE/1 印度 S-6 T/SHAMA.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: perhaps an abbreviation of plebeian

means.word_mean: 1. a military trainee (as at a military academy)
